titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: Transcribed cards. s1: <*> ("was renewed") = should be "May 16th," but looks more like "June"

1m. 1v. 25.00 Oct 5 refunded Deposit 30.00 March. 16. 365 Days March 19. 19. A time to Laugh Mar 22 weeks (may keep 2 books without extra charge) 22. Absalom, absalom April 6 22 Ralph Lox. a writer in Arms Mar 23 26 Novel & the People April 1 April 6 Revolution in Tanner's Lane April 16. 7 Crisis and Criticism. April 13. Renewed April 16 - May 16 1937- 25v May 16. Ulysses. May 20 20 Bird Alone June 7 June 7 gay & Melancholy Flux " 19 Left Review June No June 8 " 19 Burmese days June 25 was renewed May 16 - June 16 on <*> 16 Renewed June 16 - July 16 on June 19 25fr. 25 Road to Wigan Pier. July 3 July 3 Delicate Monster July 5
3 Common Sense. July July 5 5. Life + Letters No 8 July 12. 12 Challenge 20 12 Left Review. 20 17. Keep the Aspidistra Flying July 24
July 24 Inhale + Exhale. Aug 5 26 told closing THIN Aug. 5. Inhale + Exhale. Sept 20 Left Review August. Aug 6 Mme Davet will pay at end of month for her subscription Tune + Tide 6 6 Pie in the sky. Sept 10. Renewed July 16 - Sept 16 30v. Sept prolonged until Sept 30. Sept 10 Common Sense Sept. Aug_ Sept ? New Statesman 28 Aug 4 Sept Sept ? ? New Manner ...
